kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://rocklov-julius-api.herokuapp.com/sessions path_url=/sessions headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.25.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '68', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"email": "francisca@francisca.com.br", "password": "Francisca@123"}'

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Length Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the length of the given item is correct.
